altTitles.ja: 今朝も揺られてます

altTitles.en: They Are Still Being Shaken This Morning

description.en: This is your typical story of a boy who's secretly in love with a girl, they both share a 20 minute ride on the commuter train on their way to different schools, will the boy be able to approach the girl and confess his love? And also... What he doesn't know: There's 3 other passengers that secretly support the boy's secret love towards the girl! Read now the hijinks that ensue when the boy tries to approach the girl; from the creator of *[Jitsu wa Watashi wa](https://mangadex.org/title/a990c2a1-b54f-4f4f-986c-3cdab1c9f2f9/)* and *[Yumemi ga Oka Wonderland](https://mangadex.org/title/32bbfefa-8a58-462c-bc9e-e9dd3bd4c152/)*.
description.pt-br: Esta é a típica história de um garoto que está secretamente apaixonado por uma garota. Ambos compartilham uma viagem de 20 minutos no trem do subúrbio a caminho de escolas diferentes. O garoto será capaz de se aproximar da garota e confessar seu amor? E, além disso... O que ele não sabe: há três outros passageiros que secretamente apoiam o amor secreto do garoto pela garota! Leia agora as confusões que acontecem quando o garoto tenta se aproximar da garota; do criador de *[Jitsu wa Watashi wa](https://mangadex.org/title/a990c2a1-b54f-4f4f-986c-3cdab1c9f2f9/)* e *[Yumemi ga Oka Wonderland](https://mangadex.org/title/32bbfefa-8a58-462c-bc9e-e9dd3bd4c152/)*.

description.en: Reuniting with a First Love After 10 Years! Hyun Jiwoo, once a star on the Seongeon High School baseball team, faced a heartbreaking split when his junior and lover, Choi Sunho, unexpectedly left for the United States. Ten years later, Jiwoo has buried his emotions and thrown himself into his work, still haunted by the pain of that sudden separation. But his world is turned upside down when Sunho, the first love who shattered his heart, reappears—as a short-term part-time worker with a wild streak and a taste for liquor!

title.en: The Fifth Prince Exiled to the Frontier Survives with His [Luck] Skill

altTitles.ja: 辺境に追放された第5王子は【幸運】スキルでさくさく生き延びます

altTitles.ja-ro: Henkyou ni Tsuihousareta Dai 5 Ouji wa "Kouun" Skill de Sakusaku Ikinobimasu

description.en:
"Don't underestimate my reincarnation cheat!"

Elroy, the fifth prince of the Norgard royal family. He possesses the memories of his previous life and a cheat skill bestowed upon him during his reincarnation, which grants him luck that can turn the tide in dire situations [Luck - All or Nothing]

Although Elroy was recognized as a prodigy from a young age, his brilliance made him a target of disdain from his brothers, leading to his forced exile to the desolate and remote region of Ouroboroslant, where he was destined to die a miserable death. However, liberated from the palace's constraints, Elroy, alongside the strongest maid, utilizes his reincarnation cheat to transform the barren wasteland into a magnificent territory!The story of a slow-life battle fantasy in the frontier begins here!

A naga starts a new job in a new town.

Posted with [author permission](https://twitter.com/DanielLCarrier/status/1769140595296207140).

---
Alternative Official English: [TheDuckWebComics](https://www.theduckwebcomics.com/Snake_in_the_office/5771894/)

altTitles.ja: スーパーボールガールズ

description.en: Ichiyoshi continues to work at a chocolate factory, locking away his "best" in his heart. One Christmas night, on his way home, he finds a mysterious superball that rolls out of the darkness...

Han Haneul, who dreams of being in a campus romance, witnesses a drug deal involving a crazy-looking man. Shaken to the core, Hanuel desperately flees… However, as if by fate, he encounters the drug dealer, Choi Dajung, again in a club he joined to follow his favorite sunbae. And somehow, Dajung ends up at his apartment…?! Get ready for a sweet, fluffy romance with a head-in-the-clouds Haneul and the unexpectedly charming Dajung, spinning into a warm and fuzzy unrequited love!
#CampusDrama #Comedy #Cuteness #Misunderstandings #UnrequitedLove #YoungerSeme #OlderUke #PetiteUke #VirginSeme

altTitles.ja: 変な家

description.en:
I’ve always had a fascination with the occult; you might even call it my specialty. I’ve been brought in as a consultant on many supernatural and strange mysteries. But nothing could have prepared me for this house. It seemed so ordinary at first, except for that one room. It had no doors, no windows, and was tucked away, leaving anyone to think it was just a wall. I knew that there was something more to it. It shouldn’t be there, it shouldn’t exist, and yet…

Just what is this house, and what dark secrets does it hold?
description.ja: オカルト専門ライターの「私」は知人から、とある家の間取り図を見せられた。そこには正体不明の「謎の空間」が存在するという。建築設計士・栗原に意見を求めると、彼はこの家のおかしなところを次々に指摘し始めた……！

title.en: Watashi no Ue ni Ukabu "Akuyaki Reijou (Hametsu suru)" tte Nandeshou ka?

altTitles.ja: 私の上に浮かぶ『悪役令嬢(破滅する)』ってなんでしょうか？

altTitles.en: What does "Villainess (Doomed)" floating above my head mean?

description.en:
While attempting to do good deeds, she seemed to have entered the prince's doting route!

Louise, the count's daughter, for some unknown reason, can see letters above people's heads. Written above her own head are the words, "Villainess (doomed)." To change that, Louise aims to be a good-natured noblewoman. However, when she is pressed by Sylvile and tells him truthfully that his descriptor reads, "Love interest: Second Prince (Easy)" his interest is piqued and they become betrothed. Furthermore, he offers her a promise, "To make you feel at ease, I'll show you that I can change my descriptor."

altTitles.ja: ムシバミヒメ

description.en: In Toshiya Higashimoto's latest work Ai Tanaka, college student who wants to be a novelist, decides to share a room with Miu Yamaguchi who she met on the internet. Keep an your eyes on the roommates in this psychological horror.
description.ja: 【『テセウスの船』東元俊哉最新作！】小説家志望の大学生・田中愛は、募集サイトで知り合った山口美羽とルームシェアすることにしたのだが――。目が離せない、同居人サイコホラー。

altTitles.ja: 束の間の一花

description.en:
In the spring of her second year of high school, Sendawara Ichika was told by her doctor that she had two years left to live. Three years later, now in her second year of university, Ichika spends her days not knowing when the end will come.

One day, by chance, she is reunited with Yurugi Akifumi -- her former philosophy professor, who quit the university. Once in love with Yurugi-sensei, Ichika has her feelings rekindled upon meeting him again, but...

A story of the fleeting love between Ichika, whose life is growing shorter, and a man quietly trying to disappear.
description.pt-br:
Na primavera de seu segundo ano do ensino médio, Sendawara Ichika foi informada por seu médico que ela tinha dois anos de vida. Três anos depois, agora em seu segundo ano de universidade, Ichika passa seus dias sem saber quando chegará o fim. 

Um dia, por acaso, ela se reencontra com Yurugi Akifumi – seu ex-professor de filosofia, que deixou a universidade. Uma vez apaixonada por Yurugi-sensei, Ichika reacendeu seus sentimentos ao encontrá-lo novamente, mas… 

Uma história de amor fugaz entre Ichika, cuja vida está ficando cada vez mais curta, e um homem silenciosamente tentando desaparecer.

title.en: Shimotsuki-san wa Mobu ga Suki ~Hitomishiri na Kanojo wa Ore ni Dake Dere Amai~

altTitles.ja: 霜月さんはモブが好き～人見知りな彼女は俺にだけデレ甘い～

altTitles.en: Shimotsuki-san Likes the Mob: This Shy Girl is Only Sweet Towards Me

altTitles.vi: Shimotsuki-san chỉ thích nhân vật nền

altTitles.th: นิยาย ตัว (ไม่) ประกอบของคุณชิโมสึกิ เล่ม

altTitles.zh: 霜月同学喜欢上路人角色

altTitles.id: Shimotsuki-san Menyukai Mob ~Gadis Pemalu Ini Hanya Terlihat Manis di Hadapanku~

altTitles.en: She Is In Love with the Mob

altTitles.pl: Shimotsuki-san Lubi Postać Poboczną: Ta Nieśmiała Dziewczyna jest Urocza Tylko Wobec Mnie

altTitles.vi: Cô nàng Shimotsuki trót phải lòng nhân vật nền

description.en:
***Only you are special.***

After school, Koutarou Nakayama returns to school to pick up something he forgot and finds Shiho Shimotsuki asleep in an empty classroom. Shiho is rumored to be Ryouma Ryuuzaki's crush, a popular boy who has formed a harem in his class, but she is always expressionless and no one has ever seen her smile.

But now, her fair skin is holding Koutarou's hand...?! The "secret relationship" between the heroine and the mob begins!
description.id: Sepulang sekolah, Nakayama Koutarou kembali ke sekolah untuk mengambil sesuatu yang lupa dia bawa, di dalam kelas dia bertemu Shimotsuki Shiho yang terlelap. Katanya, Shiho ini ditaksir sama Ryuuzaki Ryouma, pria populer membentuk harem di kelas, namun dia tampak selalu datar dan tak ada yang pernah melihatnya tersenyum. Karena suatu kejadian mereka berdua berpegangan tangan dan memulai “hubungan rahasia” antara heroin dan mob.
description.ja:
『例えばもし、この世界が＜物語＞だとするならば主人公は一体誰になるのだろう――。』

高校入学式当日、義妹・親友・幼馴染の3人の少女に『サヨナラ』を告げられた中山幸太郎は、一人孤独な高校生活をスタートさせる。自分は誰の人生においても取るに足らない存在、『モブ』であることを明確に認識した幸太郎だったが、ある日の放課後、幸太郎は誰もいない教室で眠りこける霜月しほに遭遇する。クラスでハーレムを形成中のモテ男・竜崎龍馬の大本命だが、いつも無表情でクールと噂の彼女。その彼女が幸太郎の手を握り、満面の笑顔でこう言った。「わたしとお友達になってくれる？」

『この物語の主人公は俺ではない。そう思っていた。あの日までは――。』
description.pl:
Tylko ty jesteś wyjątkowy.

Po lekcjach Koutarou Nakayama wraca do szkoły, by zabrać coś, czego zapomniał i znajduje Shiho Shimotsuki śpiącą w pustej klasie. Mówi się, że Shiho podkochuje się w Ryoumie Ryuuzakim, popularnym chłopaku, który założył harem w swojej klasie, ale ona zawsze jest bez wyrazu i nikt nigdy nie widział jej uśmiechu.

Ale teraz, trzyma rękę Koutarou...?! Rozpoczyna się „sekretny związek” między bohaterką a postacią poboczną!
description.pt-br: Depois da escola, Kotaro Nakayama retorna à escola para pegar algo que esqueceu e encontra Shiho Shimotsuki dormindo em uma sala de aula vazia. Há rumores de que Shiho é a paixão de Ryoma Ryuuzaki, um garoto popular que formou um harém em sua classe, mas ela é sempre inexpressiva e ninguém nunca a viu sorrindo. Mas agora, ela está segurando a mão de Kotaro…?! A “relação secreta” entre a heroína e o figurante começa!

altTitles.ja: ポケットモンスターSPECIAL スカーレット・バイオレット

description.en: Violet, the “prince of speed” who drives Miraidon, runs through the Paldea region in search of the “secret spice” to regain the ability of Miraidon! A showdown with the Nushi Pokemon! Operation Stardust! And the other main character...!?
description.es: Violet, el “príncipe de la velocidad” que conduce a Miraidon, corre por la región de Paldea en busca de la “especia secreta” para recuperar la habilidad de Miraidon. ¡Un enfrentamiento con el Pokémon Nushi! ¡Operación Polvo de Estrellas! ¿¡Y el otro personaje principal...!?
description.ja: ミライドンを駆る“スピード王子”バイオレットが、ミライドンの能力を取り戻すべく「秘伝スパイス」を求めてパルデア地方を駆け巡る！　ヌシポケモンとの対決！　スターダスト作戦！　そしてもう一人の主人公は…!?

altTitles.ja: 高飛車ドレイちゃん

description.en: At the market, a man stumbles upon a particularly arrogant slave...
description.pt-br: No mercado, um homem se depara com uma escrava particularmente arrogante...

altTitles.ja: パンプキンナイト

description.en: After escaping from a mental institution, a girl with a self-inflicted facial deformity enacts twisted justice on those who mistreated her, face hidden underneath the disguise of a pumpkin.
description.es: Una deforme chica sale con una calabaza en su cabeza para matar a todos aquellos que la acosaron en su pasado después de escapar de un manicomio.
description.fr: Victime de sévices orchestrés aux yeux de tous par ses camarades de classe, une collégienne a été interné dans un hôpital psychiatrique. Plusieurs mois plus tard, alors que ses bourreaux sont aujourd’hui au lycée, ils apprennent qu’elle s’est échappée en tuant tout le personnel hospitalier qui a tenté de lui barrer la route et qu’elle est bien décidé à se venger d’eux.
description.ja: ある日、女子高生・中谷明日美は、SNSで「パンプキンナイト」という見知らぬアカウントからフォローされる。 『中谷明日美コロス』というメッセージが届いた直後、カボチャのマスクを被った殺人鬼に襲われ惨死する。 そして偶然、明日美と通話していた和也にも死の宣告が突きつけられ……。
description.kk: Бет әлпеті қатты зақымданған, оқушы қыз, бұрын оны келеке еткен адамдардың жандарын алу үшін, ауруханадан қашып шығады.
description.pt: Uma mulher deformada sai com uma abóbora na cabeça para matar todos aqueles que a maltrataram no passado depois de escapar de um hospital psiquiátrico.
description.pt-br: Uma mulher deformada sai com uma abóbora na cabeça para matar todos aqueles que fizeram bullying com ela no passado depois de escapar de um hospital psiquiátrico.

altTitles.ja: プラスティック・メモリーズ Say to good-bye

description.en:
A prequel manga to the TV anime "Plastic Memories", written from Michiru's perspective. Naturally, also featuring her partner, Zack!  
  
A future world in which Giftia, androids capable of feeling emotion, exist. However, Giftia have a predetermined service life of about nine years, and must be 'retrieved' when that time is up. Michiru has just joined Terminal Service, the department at SAI Corp. in charge of executing these retrievals, which can be said to mean ripping apart the relationship between Giftia and owner.

altTitles.ja: 見せたがりの露乃ちゃん

altTitles.zh-hk: 想要給別人看的露乃醬

altTitles.en: Tsuyuno-chan Who Wants To Show Off

description.en:
A little boy who has an armpit fetish and a high school girl who loves male attention and exposing herself so much so that she doesn't care who it is. When she notices that he has stalked her to her basketball game, she decides it wouldn't be bad to indulge him more.
___
**Alt Official Raws:**
- [niconico Manga](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/47585)
 - [ComicBunch](https://www.comicbunch.com/manga/mon/tsuyunochan/)

title.en: Ninja Chronicles: The Legend of Kagemaru

altTitles.ja: 忍者武芸帳（影丸伝）

description.en:
A historical manga that depicts people who defy fate and live by faith in a world of war.

(from MangaUpdates):

The classic, long ninja saga. Many intertwined themes and many characters. It is a series that is as well a traditional samurai tale as an attempt of Shirato to uncover the role of revolting peasants in feudal Japan. 

It was adapted into a film by Nagisa Oshima in 1966.

Kagemaru is a fictional samurai, the hero of the story, aiding the peasants in their struggle for life. Nobunaga Oda, the historical 16th century warlord is his opponent.

title.en: Ore Igai Dare mo Saishu Dekinai Sozai na no ni "Sozai Saishuritsu ga Hikui" to Pawahara suru Osananajimi Renkinjutsushi to Zetsuen shita Senzoku Madoushi, Henkyou no Machi de Slow Life wo Okuritai.

altTitles.ja: 俺以外誰も採取できない素材なのに「素材採取率が低い」とパワハラする幼馴染錬金術師と絶縁した専属魔導士、辺境の町でスローライフを送りたい。

altTitles.en: The Assistant Mage Parts Ways With His Power Abusive Alchemist Childhood Friend and His Being Told to Have "Low Chance of Gathering Materials," and Wants to Start a Slow Life at a Town in the Remote Region

altTitles.id: Padahal Hanya Aku yang Dapat Mengumpulkan Material Itu, tapi Aku Dikatai "Tingkat Pengumpulan Materialmu Ampas" sama Teman Semasa Kecilku yang Menjadi Alkemis, Aku pun Pensiun Menjadi Asisten Penyihirnya dan Memulai Hidup Baru yang Santai di Kota Terpencil.

description.en:
Lloyd, the assistant mage of the genius alchemist Ruby, has an abnormally low chance of gathering materials for alchemy use. Hence, he is treated as baggage and is made to be the bottom of the entire country’s joke. 

Everyday is a day he is scolded by Ruby. It’s become too much of a despairing environment that he’s come to hate it. And so, he finally decided to part ways with her. 

However, unbeknownst to everyone was that the materials Lloyd gathered were all high-grade materials no one else could gather.

The mage, who was treated as "incompetent" and saw himself as such, now aims for an ideal easygoing life!
description.id: Asisten Penyihir, Lloyd, mempunyai kemampuan mengumpulkan material untuk alkemis yang rendah daripada orang lain yang membuat Alkemis yang menggangdengnya, Ruby, terus-terusan memarahi Lloyd yang dimatanya tidak pernah benar. Suatu hari dia muak dengan perlakuan Ruby yang makin menjadi-jadi dan memutuskan untuk pensiun menjadi asisten penyihirnya. Lantas, akan ke mana Lloyd pergi?
description.ja:
天才錬金術師ルビーの専属魔導士ロイドは、錬金術で使う素材の採取率が異常に低いため、ルビーのお荷物扱いとして国中の笑いものになっていた。
ルビーからも毎日怒られる日々を過ごしていた彼だが、あまりにも絶望的なこの環境が嫌になりついに彼女との絶縁を決意する！
しかし、みんなは知らなかった……。ロイドの揃える素材は、ほかの誰にも集められないような貴重なモノばかりだということに……。

自他ともに「無能扱い」されていた魔導士が目指す、理想のスローライフ！

altTitles.ja: 303号室の神さま
神様です。サービスするよ
神様と陰気な少年

altTitles.en: I'm a God. I'll serve you.

altTitles.vi: Tôi là một vị thần. Tôi sẽ giúp bạn
Thần và cậu bé u ám

description.en:
**Link:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/user/24367326/series/236717)

title.en: 86 -Eighty Six- Mahou Shoujo Regina ☆ Lena ~Tatakae! Ginga Koukou Senkan San Magnolia~

altTitles.ja: ８６―エイティシックス― 魔法少女レジーナ☆レーナ ～戦え！銀河航行戦艦サンマグノリア～

altTitles.en: 86 -Eighty Six- Magical Girl Regina ☆ Lena ~Fight! Galactic Cruise Battleship San Magnolia~

description.en: A new "86 -Eighty Six-" series spin-off set on the stage of the "Galactic Navigating Battleship San Magnolia"! To protect that ship and its people from their enemy, an army known as the Legion, the Handlers (Magical Girls) along with their partners the Eighty-Six (Guardian Spirits) run through the cosmos!And so, the battle of the Magical Girl Lena is about to begin...!

title.ja: Silent Witch Chinmoku no Majo no Kakushigoto

altTitles.ja: サイレント・ウィッチ 沈黙の魔女の隠しごと

altTitles.en: Silent Witch: Secrets of the Silent Witch

description.en:
Monica Everett is revered as “The Silent Witch.” She’s the only magician in the world who can use magic without an incantation... In reality though, she’s just shy— the only reason she practiced chantless magic was so that she wouldn't have to speak in public! Before even realizing her own talent, Monica is chosen as one of the “Seven Sages,” and is assigned the secret mission of protecting the kingdom’s second prince...?

The antisocial young prodigy will have to hide her true nature while secretly rescuing the prince from encroaching danger in this thrilling fantasy story!
description.es:
Monica Everett es venerada como «La Bruja Silenciosa». Es la única maga del mundo que puede usar la magia sin conjuros... En realidad, es tímida: ¡la única razón por la que practicaba magia sin encantamientos era para no tener que hablar en público! Antes incluso de darse cuenta de su propio talento, Mónica es elegida como uno de los «Siete Sabios», ¿y se le asigna la misión secreta de proteger al segundo príncipe del reino...?

La antisocial joven prodigio tendrá que ocultar su verdadera naturaleza mientras rescata en secreto al príncipe del peligro que la acecha en esta emocionante historia de fantasía.
description.id: Keajaiban tidak membutuhkan nyanyian. Ini adalah kisah tentang penyihir terlemah, paling pemalu, namun terkuat, dan bagaimana dia dilahirkan kembali, semuanya menjadi sebuah buku. (Penyihir Keheningan) Monica Everett. Satu-satunya penyihir di dunia yang bisa menggunakan sihir diam (tanpa nyanyian), dan seorang pahlawan muda yang membunuh sendiri naga hitam legendaris itu. Tapi apa sifat aslinya?? Alasan sebenarnya saya berlatih sihir diam adalah agar saya tidak perlu berbicara di depan umum. Ketika Monica terpilih sebagai salah satu dari 7 Watchers, tanpa disadari, dia terpaksa mengambil misi rahasia untuk melindungi pangeran kedua…? Lemah dan pemalu, namun yang terkuat. Penyihir surgawi yang antisosial menyembunyikan identitas aslinya dan diam-diam membawa kejahatan ke pengadilan melawan pangeran dalam fantasi yang menyakitkan! Fantasi penyihir web, terlahir kembali menjadi sebuah buku, dengan tambahan! Apa yang akan menjadi misteri baru yang berdiri di depan Monica Everett…?

description.en:
Woo Jae was raised by his mother who was obsessed with shamanism. The day Woojae got tired of her mother's obssession, he refused to pray for the first time. His mother, on the other hand, died that day on a car accident. Suffering from guilt, Woo Jae began to suffer from a strange symptoms of seeing futile things, sleeping and having nightmares from time to time, and wonders whether he should visit the shaman again. At that time, a man calls himself Imoogi and suggests that he can cure Woo Jae's symptoms.

But... is the treatment method includes skinship?
Can I trust this man?
description.ko:
무속 신앙에 광적으로 집착하는 어머니 밑에서 자란 우재.

그와 관련된 일이라면 지긋지긋해진 우재가 처음으로 굿을 거부한 날, 교통사고로 어머니가 세상을 떠난다. 죄책감에 괴로워하던 우재는 헛것을 보거나 시시때때로 잠들고 악몽을 꾸는 기묘한 증상을 겪기 시작하고, 다시 무당을 찾아가야 할지 고민한다.

그때, 한 남자가 스스로를 이무기라 칭하며 나타나 우재의 증상을 낫게 해줄 수 있다며 제안해온다.

title.en: Gyaru to Nekura no Kyuuketsu Kankei

altTitles.ja: ギャルとネクラの吸血関係

altTitles.en: The Bloody Relationship Between Nekura and Gal

altTitles.zh: 辣妹与阴角的吸血关系

altTitles.ja-ro: Gyaru to Nekura no Kyuuketsuki Kankei

description.en: Fake gyaru Hadekawa Iyone failed her gyaru debut  in high school, but trying to break away from her situation as an outcast, tried talking to her seat neighbor, Chisui Makuru, who turned out to be the vampire rumored about in town! Although, Makuru isn't the typical vampire everyone imagines... And thus begins the slightly strange high school life of a gyaru in search of friends, and a vampire in search of an underling.

altTitles.en: I'm in Love With the Older Girl Next Door

altTitles.ja: 隣のお姉さんが好き

altTitles.en: I Love The Older Girl Next Door.

description.en: There's this beautiful, bubbly, film-loving girl who's three years older than me: her name's Shia, and she lives right next door! I'm madly in love with her, and I needed some way to see her! I settled on asking her for movie recommendations, and now I get to meet her every Wednesday! I want to know more about her, and tell her how I feel... but I just can't get the message across! Enjoy this lopsided rom-com brought to you by the author of "The Girl I Like Forgot Her Glasses" and "Paper Braver", Koume Fujichika!

altTitles.ja: 蟻の帝国

description.en: This is the ant empire, where the queen's scent rules everything. Luli'a leads a peaceful life picking medicinal herbs with his younger brother. One day, he is imprisoned for defending a medicine doctor, and while in prison, he has a seizure and bursts into tears. The tears are a pheromone that controls everyone around him, and a sign that Luhya is the "Queen's Egg." This metamorphosis fantasy!
description.vi:
Tất cả kiến đều làm việc vì nữ hoàng.
Đây là đế quốc kiến nơi mùi hương của nữ hoàng chi phối tất cả. Một "dấu hiệu" xuất hiện đã thay đổi vận mệnh của kiến thợ Lulya.

altTitles.ja: 美味しんぼ

description.en:
Around the offices of Tozai News, Shiro Yamaoka has a reputation for being over-blunt, under-ambitious, and generally an all-around slacker. So why has he been given the important job of coming up with the "Ultimate Menu" to celebrate the newspaper's 100th anniversary? Because he possesses qualities his other colleagues don't: an exquisitely discerning palate, an encyclopedic knowledge of food and drink, and a masterful touch in the kitchen.

---
- **Won the Shogakukan Manga Award for Seinen/General in 1987**

altTitles.ja-ro: うちのメイドがウザすぎる！

altTitles.en: UzaMaid: Our Maid Is Way Too Annoying!

description.en:
Former Air Force Master Sergeant Kamoi Tsubame tries changing careers to finally get cute girls to wear her cute self-designed clothes. To that end she tries to get a job in the Takanashi household as a maid and babysitter to Yasuhiro Takanashi's spoiled daughter Misha Takanashi, as it seems that her mother is no longer present.  
  
Misha has successfully gotten rid of previous maids through playing devastating pranks like throwing mud, laying out banana peels to slip on and lighting the washed clothes on fire. In face of the newest applicant boasting that she has military experience, Misha even thinks about researching bomb making.
description.ja: 母を亡くし父と二人で暮らす小学生女子・ミーシャ。そんな父子家庭にやってきた新人家政婦は、やたらマッチョな上に三度の飯より幼女が大好きで…！？

altTitles.ja: 性魔討伐電影団

description.ja:
性魔は残らずイカせて逝かす！！
撮れ高のためならどんな暴挙も厭わない映像研の鬼監督JK・小鬼山と、そんな彼女に振り回され続けている幼馴染の大概。ある日、部室に届いた奇妙な箱を開けてしまい、小鬼山が悪霊に取り憑かれてしまう。小鬼山を助ける方法はただ一つーー取り憑いた欲求不満な霊たち"性魔"をイカせること！！

altTitles.ja: DRAGON BALL カラー版

description.en: Goku and friends battle intergalactic evil in the greatest action-adventure-fantasy-comedy-fighting series ever! Legend has it that if all seven of the precious orbs called “Dragon Balls” are gathered together, an incredibly powerful dragon god will appear to grant one wish. Unfortunately, the orbs are scattered across the world, making them extremely difficult to collect. Enter 16-year-old Bulma, a scientific genius who has constructed a radar to detect the exact locations of the Dragon Balls. She’s on a mission to find all seven orbs, but first she must convince young Son Goku to join her on her quest. With a monkey tail, superhuman strength and a magic staff for a weapon, Son Goku is ready to set out on the adventure of a lifetime…

title.en: I Have Nine Quadrillion Simp Gold Coins

altTitles.vi: Ta Có 90 Tỷ Tiền Liếm Cẩu!

altTitles.en: I Have 90 Billion Licking Gold Coins

description.en: Down-and-out university student Chen Yuan, devotedly pursues Goddess Lin Shutong for three years, gets kicked in the face. In his grief, he accidentally activates the “Licking Dog System” with a memory of 90 trillion Licking Dog Money, solely for licking women. The more you spend, the more you get back, and you can also obtain various attribute bonuses, transforming into a little superhero. It's called the Licking Dog System, but do I really want to be a licking dog? As long as I lick enough, I'll be the king. As long as I prove my love with enough money, I can turn the goddess into my licking dog! At this moment, Chen Yuan, who has undergone a great awakening, embarks on his life as a rich and licking dog.

altTitles.ja: カタブツ系女子に告白してみた

altTitles.en: I Tried Confessing My Love to a Serious Girl

description.en: Although she's pretty, she's widely rumoured to be the school's number one straight-laced girl. So when I gathered up my courage to confess to her…‽
description.ja: 美人だけど学校一『カタブツ』だと噂の女子に勇気を出して告白すると…!?

altTitles.ja: 遊☆戯☆王 OCGストラクチャーズ
遊☆戯☆王 オフィシャルカードゲーム ストラクチャーズ
遊戯王 OCGストラクチャーズ
遊戯王 オフィシャルカードゲーム ストラクチャーズ

altTitles.pt-br: O Rei dos Jogos! Estruturas OCG

description.en:
Shoma Yusa, a new kid who moved to Tokyo with his sister, learns how to make friends through Dueling and creating Structure Decks.  
  
*This series is based on the real life Yu-Gi-Oh! OCG (Official Card Game, known in the west as TCG) and how to build the best deck, based on the latest rule- and banlist.*
description.pt-br:
Shoma Yusa, um novo garoto que se mudou para Tóquio com sua irmã, aprende a fazer amigos através de Duelos e criando Decks Estruturais. 

*Esta série é baseada no jogo da vida real de Yu-Gi-Oh! OCG (Official Card Game, conhecido no ocidente como TCG) e como construir o melhor deck, com base nas últimas regras e banlists.*

altTitles.ja: 天使の別荘はお好きですか？

altTitles.ja-ro: Tenshi no Bessho wa Osuki desuka?

description.en:
It is a romance story manga set in maid cafe between Tsubaki Tachibana, who never smiles at school, and Tsukushi Sugina, who happens to have the same part-time job.

___
You can support the author by buying the manga in [Booth.pm](https://inadahime.booth.pm/)

altTitles.ja: 闇麻のマミヤ

description.en: It has been 20 years since the legendary mahjong player, Akagi, left this world. In this new era known as "Reiwa," a mahjong player who solves disputes with mahjong gambles has appeared, only known as "Yami-Mahjong Fighter Mamiya!"

title.en: Tonari no Seki no Yatsu ga Souiu Me de Mitekuru

altTitles.ja: となりの席のヤツがそういう目で見てくる

altTitles.es-la: La persona sentada a mi lado me mira de esa manera
La persona de al lado me mira con esos ojos

altTitles.uk: Однокласниця що сидить біля мене, дивиться на мене хтивими очима

description.en:
Of course, viewers are excited, but will those being watched feel the same excitement...?
 Brought to you by mmk of 'Love Comedy Quest,' this is a pure love short comedy of the new era about 'neighbors'!

This is a story about: a female lead who transforms into a child after losing her virginity, her identity switches between an adult and a kid. With the crown prince who has a dual personality too, there's equal parts love and bite.

altTitles.ja: 複雑な姉弟の４コマ

altTitles.en: A Complicated Older Sister and Younger Brother 4-Koma
The Person I Met In-Game Was Actually My Big Sister

description.en:
"Big Sis!?"
"Kouta!?"


The two of them were enjoying an in-game romance (without knowing each other's identities). Upon seeing each other's faces at their long-awaited offline meetup... they were both shocked to see that their partner was in fact their own sibling!?

These are complicated feelings for sure... and rather hard to accept!

(Source: Kadokawa)

---

Additional Links

* [Kadokawa](https://store.kadokawa.co.jp/shop/g/g322302001578/) (Publisher)
* [BookLive](https://booklive.jp/product/index/title_id/20068503/vol_no/001)
description.ja:
「姉ちゃん!?」
「康太!?」

＊

ゲーム内で恋愛を楽しんでいたふたり。
待ちに待ったオフ会で顔を合わせたら……相手はまさかの姉弟で!?
複雑なこの感情……なかなか飲み込むのは難しい！

ＳＮＳで話題のカオス展開ラブコメが、 描き下ろしを加えて待望の書籍化!!

title.en: Tune In to the Midnight Heart

altTitles.ja: 真夜中ハートチューン

altTitles.en: Finding the girl behind the voice.

altTitles.pt-br: Sintonizando com o Coração da Meia Noite
Em busca da garota por trás da voz

description.en:
***"Late at night, alone on my bed, your voice was the only thing that saved me. I want to talk to you again. There's something I want to say."***

Without knowing her real name or face, Yamabuki Arisu, a second-year high school student, was looking for a girl named "Apollo'' who was a livestreamer. However, one day, Arisu gets a clue about Apollo from the broadcast club of the high school where she is going. There were 4 beautiful girls who dreamed of "getting a job related to voice"!! Who is Apollo? What will happen to the dreams of the four people? A cute yet hard-working success romantic comedy begins here!!

---
**Links:**
- Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10568/episode/347385) (U.S. Only)
description.ja:
***「深夜ひとり、ベッドの上、キミの声だけが救いだった。もう一度キミと話したい。言いたいことがあるんだ」。***

高校2年生の山吹有栖は、「アポロ」という名の、顔も本名も知らないラジオ配信者の少女を探していた。だがある日、有栖は進学先の高校の放送部にアポロの手がかりを得る。そこにいたのは「声に関わる仕事に就く」夢を描く美少女が…4人!!アポロは誰？4人の夢の行方は？かわいくも懸命なサクセスラブコメ、ここに開演!!
description.pt-br: Yamabuki Arisu, um estudante do segundo ano do ensino médio, estava procurando por uma garota chamada “Apollo”, que era locutora de rádio e ele não conhecia seu rosto ou seu nome verdadeiro. No entanto, um dia, Arisu recebe uma pista sobre Apollo do clube de transmissão da escola secundária para a qual ela estava indo. Havia quatro belas garotas que sonhavam em “conseguir um emprego relacionado à voz”!! Quem é Apollo? O que acontecerá com os sonhos dessas quatro pessoas? Uma comédia romântica fofa, mas trabalhadora e de sucesso, começa aqui!!

altTitles.ja: 亜童

description.en:
Developed as instruments of war, the existence of the young Adou's have yet to be known by the residents of a futuristic globalised Japan. Join Riko as she spirals into a government conspiracy.  


---

**Links:**  
- [Author's Twitter](https://twitter.com/b0mb00)

When vlogger meets top-of-the-industry writer, what could go wrong? Everything! Nothing has gone my way ever since meeting her.

Hu Luoluo, on the brink of having her vlogger account relinquished, is shoved into the path of scandal-ridden writer extraordinaire Song Li purely by accident. Being featured on hot topics, paired up as a couple, finally gaining traffic... Will it finally make her the greatest vlogger of all time?
description.es-la: Juntos o se hunden juntos, ¿se descubrirán mentiras sobre el amor? Están ligados por negocios, fingiendo ser pareja para contrarrestar los escándalos del escritor y lograr ser el primer lugar en el buscador.

title.en: Ore wa Shiranai Uchi ni Gakkouichi no Bishoujo o Kudoiteita Rashii: Baito-saki no Soudan Aite ni Ore no Omoibito no Hanashi o Suru to Kanojo wa Naze ka Tere Hajimeru

altTitles.ja: 俺は知らないうちに学校一の美少女を口説いていたらしい ～バイト先の相談相手に俺の想い人の話をすると彼女はなぜか照れ始める～

altTitles.en: It Seems I Was Hitting on the Most Beautiful Girl in School Without Me Noticing: When I Told My Friend at Work About the Girl I Love She Started to Get Embarrassed for Some Reason

description.en:
The protagonist begins to get involved with the most beautiful girl in school, who is famous for her cold attitude, and slowly becomes attracted to her.

That protagonist finds himself in a consulting relationship with a plain girl in glasses at his part-time job.

He doesn’t realize that the girl he is consulting is the same girl he is in love with, and just keeps telling her about his growing feelings while continuing to fall in love with her.

The heroine realizes that the person he is in love with is herself, and although she is embarrassed by the protagonist’ feelings, she gradually becomes attracted to him.

altTitles.ja: Chichi to Higegorira to Watashi

altTitles.en: Dad, the Beard Gorilla, and I
Dad, the Bearded Gorilla, and I
Papá, el Gorila Barbudo, y Yo

altTitles.ja: 父とヒゲゴリラと私

description.en: After losing her mother to a tragic accident, 6-year old tomboy, Michiru, finds a suspicious person moving into her precious home: her dad's giant younger brother Kouji, the 'Beard Gorilla'. While awkward at first, it doesn't take long for the two to develop a familiar bond that looks more like that of a brother and a sister, than that of niece & uncle.
description.zh:
开心的日子也好，寂寞的日子也好，都是大家大家珍贵的回忆。
在同一屋檐下，哥哥+弟弟+哥哥的女儿‼ 一部有点不寻常的家庭喜剧‼

altTitles.ja: 日常

altTitles.th: สามัญขยันรั่ว

description.de: Währendessen der Titel "alltägliches Leben" bedeutet ist der Inhalt alles andere als alltäglich. Es handelt sich um ein komplett bizarres und verücktes "alltags Leben" von einer gruppe High School Schüler. Das Setting ist eine außergewöhnliche Schule, wo du den Rektor sehen kannst wie er mit einen Reh kämpft oder einen Roboter Arm. Wie auch immer, es gibt immernoch normale Geshichten, wie ein Kartenhaus bauen oder einen Test schreiben für den du dich nicht vorbereitet bist. Der Stil ist süß aber mischt auch extreme Ausdrücke und Actionszenen für Überraschende Komedie Einlagen.
description.en:
While the title suggests a story of simple, everyday school life, the contents are more the opposite. The setting is a strange school where you may see the principal wrestle a deer or a robot's arm hide a rollcake. However there are still normal stories, like making a card castle or taking a test you didn't study for. The art style is cute but mixes with extreme expressions and action sequences for surprising comedy bits.

(The original magazine run ends at Chapter 192)
description.ru: Обычная манга про обыную японскую жизнь.
description.uk: Хоча назва вказує на щось буденне, вона є абсолютним протилежним до того, що коїться у манзі. Дії відбуваються у дуже дивній школі, де директор не проти побоксувати з оленем. Або робот, у руці якого сховано тістечко. Звісно не обійшлося без буденності, як от коли вірша забув вивчити і вчиш на уроці. Або картковий дім, який ти вже майже добудував, руйнується вщент! Словом, небуденна буденність.
description.pt-br: Enquanto o título sugere uma história simples de vida escolar, todos os dias, o conteúdo é mais o contrário. O cenário é uma escola estranha, onde você poderá ver o principal lutar com um cervo ou o braço de um robô esconder um bolo. No entanto ainda há histórias normais, como fazer um castelo de cartas ou de um teste que você não estudou. O estilo de arte é bonito, mas se mistura com expressões extremas e sequências de ação para os bits de comédia surpreendentes...

altTitles.vi: Tối Cường Phản Sáo Lộ Hệ Thống

description.en:
Scamming all day, every day, often venturing alone. He bluffs to get the ultimate power in this cultivation world?! world traveler Xue Que doesn’t always bluff, but he needs to.  
  
"Before you get your hopes up, The Character is Absolute Garbage, The Manhua is Pure comedy at best… The plot ehhh not so much"  
  
Term : META Stands for (Most Effective Tactic Available) Metagaming is any strategy, action or method used in a game which transcends a prescribed ruleset, uses external factors to affect the game, or goes beyond the supposed limits or environment set by the game. Another definition refers to the game universe outside of the game itself. *(citation needed)*
description.fr:
Escroquer toute la journée, tous les jours, souvent en s'aventurant seul. Il bluffe pour obtenir le pouvoir ultime dans ce monde de culture ! Le voyageur du monde Xue Que ne bluffe pas toujours, mais il en a besoin.

Terme : META signifie (Most Effective Tactic Available) Metagaming est la stratégie, l'action ou la méthode utilisée dans un jeu qui transcende un ensemble de règles prescrit, utilise des facteurs externes pour affecter le jeu, ou va au-delà des limites supposées ou l'environnement établi par le jeu. Une autre définition fait référence à l'univers du jeu en dehors du jeu lui-même.

description.en:
Wanderer, imposing, somewhere in the vast void of space, Rendezvous awaits! The only space station built inside a living being, where the best scientists, warriors, explorers and engineers of the galaxy live.
Follow the adventures of the Rendezvaj against the galaxy's major enemy; The Raccoon-race "preservation" Federation in this epic Space Opera.
description.es-la:
Errante, imponente, en algún lugar del vasto vacío espacial, Rendezvous espera! La única estación espacial construida dentro de un ser vivo, que aloja a los mejores científicos, guerreros, exploradores e ingenieros de la galaxia.
Sigue las aventuras de un grupo de Rendezvaj contra su mayor enemigo; La Federación de “Conservación” de la raza Mapache en esta épica ópera spacial.

title.en: Koi wo Suru ni wa Lv. ga Tarimasen!

altTitles.ja: 恋をするにはLv.が足りません！

altTitles.ja-ro: Koi o Suru ni wa Level ga Tarimasen!
Koi wo Suru ni wa Level ga Tarimasen!

altTitles.en: My Level Is Too Low to Fall in Love!

description.en:
Seto, an office worker, enjoyed being pampered as "Rabi," his beautiful female gaming avatar. One day, his cheerful junior Kujou, just back from abroad, was assigned to work under him. Despite Seto's gloominess, Kujou wanted to befriend him and approached him. Though initially bewildered, Seto, with zero love experience, was quickly knocked out by Kujou's smile…!?

That night, still troubled by this unknown situation, Seto began interacting with people as Rabi in-game and was shocked when "Jack," an old acquaintance, suddenly appeared. To his surprise, it was Kujou, the source of his worries! Determined to keep his IRL identity a secret (Rabi = Seto), and maybe a little too conscious of Kujou, he ended up having a wet dream about him – and then he even let that fact slip…!?

Gloomy bachelor x inexperienced otaku—a double life love comedy!

altTitles.ja: ねこに転生したおじさん

altTitles.en: The Old Man Who Was Reincarnated as a Cat

description.en: An old man was hit by a truck and found himself reincarnated as a cat.

title.en: After Transmigrating Into the Book, I Raised the Sickly Side Male Character to Be the Yandere

altTitles.zh: Chuan Shu Hou, Wo Yang De Bing Ruo Nan Pei Cheng Bing Jiaole
穿书后，我养的病弱男配成病娇了

description.en: Jiang Nian likes the book's beautiful men to be courted, he has a long way to life, no love, still died in the book! In the chance of accident, Jiang read to wear books as a man's close maid, facing the poor cubs who have not grown sick, Jiang Jiang read to play her mother's property, love to the end. But I still got my cubs out... ...?

A psychic high-schooler Tae-rin discovered the story of a ghost one day. After that she realized, humans are more dangerous than ghosts. Tae-rin then decides to help the ghosts get rid of their grudges with her childhood friend, Chang-woo.

title.en: Uketsukejo ni Kokuhaku Shitakute Guild ni Kayoitsumetara Eiyu ni Natteta

altTitles.ja: 受付嬢に告白したくてギルドに通いつめたら英雄になってた

altTitles.en: I Wanted to Confess to the Receptionist, but When I Went to the Guild, I Became a Hero

altTitles.ja-ro: Uketsukejo ni Kokuhaku Shitakute Girudo ni Kayoitsumetara Eiyu ni Natteta

description.en:
**I Became the Strongest Hero by Frequenting the Guild Just to See the Receptionist!**

Jade, who aims to become the strongest adventurer, arrives at the guild and falls in love at first sight with the receptionist! Determined to talk to her, he realizes the only way to do so is to complete as many quests as possible. Thus begins Jade's journey, driven by love, to become the ultimate hero through relentless questing and adventure.
description.id:
**Saya Menjadi Pahlawan Terkuat dengan Sering Mengunjungi Guild Hanya untuk Melihat Resepsionis!**

Jade, yang ingin menjadi petualang terkuat, tiba di guild dan jatuh cinta pada pandangan pertama dengan resepsionis! Bertekad untuk berbicara dengannya, ia menyadari bahwa satu-satunya cara untuk melakukannya adalah dengan menyelesaikan quest sebanyak mungkin. Maka dimulailah perjalanan Jade, yang didorong oleh cinta, untuk menjadi pahlawan utama melalui pencarian dan petualangan tanpa henti.
